channel.title: Comments on: Visual Studio 2010 Remote Desktop Performance Tips

item.title: By: Adam
item.dc:creator: Adam
item.description:
If you need to access graphics-heavy applications over RDP, you may want to look at Ericom Blaze, a software product that accelerates AND compresses standard Microsoft RDP, so it speeds RDP while conserving bandwidth. Blaze accelerates RDP performance by as much as 10-25 times, and helps deliver higher frame rates and reduce screen freezes and choppiness.
You can read more about Blaze and download a free evaluation at: http://www.ericom.com/ericom_blaze.asp?URL_ID=708
Adam
item.content:encoded:
If you need to access graphics-heavy applications over RDP, you may want to look at Ericom Blaze, a software product that accelerates AND compresses standard Microsoft RDP, so it speeds RDP while conserving bandwidth. Blaze accelerates RDP performance by as much as 10-25 times, and helps deliver higher frame rates and reduce screen freezes and choppiness.

You can read more about Blaze and download a free evaluation at:
http://www.ericom.com/ericom_blaze.asp?URL_ID=708
